org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi.VCSContext

    • Uses of VCSContext in org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi

      Fields in org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi declared as VCSContext 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static VCSContext VCSContext.EMPTY
      VCSContext that contains no files.
      Methods in org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi that return VCSContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VCSContext VCSContext.forNodes(Node[] nodes)
      Initializes the context from array of nodes (typically currently activated nodes).
      Methods in org.netbeans.modules.versioning.spi with parameters of type VCSContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Image VCSAnnotator.annotateIcon(Image icon, VCSContext context)
      Allows a versioning system to decorate given icon (badging).
      String VCSAnnotator.annotateName(String name, VCSContext context)
      Allows a versioning system to decorate given name with HTML markup.
      Action[] VCSAnnotator.getActions(VCSContext context, VCSAnnotator.ActionDestination destination)
      Returns set of actions to offer to the user use on a given context.
